testcase.name: Using string in request
testcase.system-out: * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * def random_string = ..................................................... passed * def string = random_string(5) .......................................... passed * match string == '#string' ............................................... passed * print 'Random string generated',string .................................. passed Given url 'https://reqres.in/api/users' ................................... passed And request { name: '#(string)', job: 'Automation', company: 'TEK' } ...... passed And param delay = 2 ....................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed Then print 'Response ID', response ........................................ passed * def responseID = response.id ............................................ passed * print 'Response ID generated for request is ',responseID ................ passed
